name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
schedule:
Week 1   Introduction to Surface Science and Technology
Week 2   From Single Crystal to Single Crystal Surfaces-1
Week 3   From Single Crystal to Single Crystal Surfaces-2
Week 4   Surface Relaxation and Reconstruction
Week 5   Adsorption and Bonding
Week 6   Kinetics of Surface Adsorption
Week 7   Get Ready to Surface Science
Week 8   Mid Term Examination
Week 9   Electron-materials Interaction
Week 10  Electron-material (XPS)
Week 11  Electron-material (XPS & AES)
Week 12  Electron-material (AES)
Week 13  Surface Microscopy (STM)
Week 14  Surface Microscopy (STM, AFM)
Week 15  Surface Microscopy (AFM)
Week 16  Thermal Spectroscopy Temperature Programmed Desorption (TPD)
Week 17  Final Exam.
Week 18  Make-up Day
scorePolicy:
Mid Term Examination: 40%　　　　Final Examination: 40%
Absent and Tardy: 20%
